function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation in indoor spaces leading to high CO2 levels","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised occupant safety","Mitigation":"Enhance ventilation systems, monitor CO2 levels, engage building services engineer","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, CO2 monitors","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Design of school classrooms allowing CO2 levels to reach 2000 ppm for brief periods","Impact":"Potential increase in COVID-19 risk levels","Mitigation":"Active management of classroom windows and ventilation openings, monitoring CO2 levels","Technologies":"Window management systems, CO2 monitors","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"School administrators, facility managers"}]}
